S06psp_5u:951_0: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā
S06psp_5u:951_1: dharmaṃ deśayaty udānaṃ codānayanti. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha
S06psp_5u:952: ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_5u:953: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:954: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:955: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvamārgaṃ paripūrayamāṇā yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
S06psp_5u:956: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:957: evaṃ duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:959: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:960: katameṣāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpās te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti vinivartanīyānāṃ vā avinivartanīyānāṃ vā?
S06psp_5u:961: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:962: santi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:963: santi vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:964_0: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ
S06psp_5u:964_1: codānayanti. ye 'pi te ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S06psp_5u:964_2: caranti teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:965: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:966: sarvadharmā anutpattikā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikair (PSP_5:44)
S06psp_5u:968: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06psp_5u:969: sarvadharmāḥ śāntā ity adhimuktāḥ sarvadharmā vigatā iti tucchakā iti vaśikā ity asārakā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06psp_5u:970: eṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:971: yeṣāṃ te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūupā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti,
S06psp_5u:972: teṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prahīṇā śrāvakabhūmiś ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_5u:974: yasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti,
S06psp_5u:975: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati yatra sthitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_5u:976_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:976_1: śrutvā na kāṅkṣiṣyanti na vicikitsiṣyanti na dhandhāyiṣyanti. evam etad yathā tathāgatenārhatā
S06psp_5u:979: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:980: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:981_0: na ca nāma bhagavan kaścit tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati nāpi kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_5u:981_1: abhisaṃbudhyate nāpi kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati. atha ca nāvalīyate na cāsya kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ
S06psp_5u:981_2: vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhavati. iti prajñaptisahāryapudgalādhiṣṭhāno dvitiyo grāhakavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:982: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:983: kathaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_5u:984: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:986: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ māyopamaṃ cittam.
S06psp_5u:994: na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ tatra samanupaśyasi tvaṃ cittam.
S06psp_5u:999: subhūte 'nyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:1002_0: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo
S06psp_5u:1002_1: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. so 'haṃ bhagavann anyaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyan
S06psp_5u:1002_2: tatkatamaṃ dharmam upadekṣyāmy asti vā nāsti veti?
S06psp_5u:1003: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'stitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vopaiti,
S06psp_5u:1004: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1005: na cāsaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbohotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1006: tathā hi bhagavaṃs te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye saṃkliśyeyur vyavadāyeyur vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1019: yaś cātyantavivikto dharmo na sa bhāvayitavyo vā vibhāvayitavyo vā,
S06psp_5u:1021: yady atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā tat kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitam āgamya bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:1024: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1035_0: anuttarā samayaksaṃbodhir atyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatā atyantaviviktā. yathā
S06psp_5u:1035_1: subhūte 'tyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā tathātyantaviviktām anuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:1036_0: sacet subhūte na prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktābhaviṣyad yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā
S06psp_5u:1036_1: bhaviṣyan na prajñāpāramitābhaviṣyad yāvan na sarvākārajñatābhaviṣyad evaṃ na prajñapāramitā.
S06psp_5u:1036_2: ye ca punar evaṃ śroṣyanti akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
S06psp_5u:1036_3: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntikād,
S06psp_5u:1037: ayam api bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgala imāṃ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
S06psp_5u:1038: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā tathādhimucyamāno 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_5u:1039: evaṃ bahukaraṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_5u:1040: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhimokṣyante 'dhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadyamānās tiṣṭhanti sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_5u:1042: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathatāyāṃ sthitvā tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamāno na kaścid dharmam upalabhate tadā kathaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām?
S06psp_5u:1043: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1044: yathā subhūte tathāgatanirmitas tiṣṭhati tathā tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_5u:1045: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1046: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1048: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:1049: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:1051: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati (PSP_5:47)
S06psp_5u:1052: tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:1053: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1055: tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:1056: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1057: ko yā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1059: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:1061: na subhūte tathāgatanirmitaḥ kaścid dharmam upalabhate yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1062: yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:1063: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samysaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyantiti,
S06psp_5u:1064: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1065: utpādād vā subhūte tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_5u:1066: neha subhūte tathatāyāṃ kaścit tiṣṭhati na tathatāyāṃ kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate na tathatāyāṃ kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1067: na hy atra tathatāyāṃ dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:1069: yo vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1070: yo vā tathatāyā sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1072: naivāsyotpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvam. yatrāsya dharmasya notpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1074: ko vā tatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:1075: tasmāt tarhi subhūte prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā,
S06psp_5u:1076: tasmāt subhūte prajñapāramitām āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1079: na ca tām anāgamya prajñāpāramitām abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:1082: gambhīre bhagavann arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1088: tañ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yad uta śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:1090: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā na kaścid duṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1091: tathā hi bhagavan so 'rtho nopalabhyate yaṃ sākṣātkuryāt. sāpi prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate yayā sākṣātkuryāt,
S06psp_5u:1093: anupalabhamāno bhagavan sarvadharmāṃs tat katamam arthaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati?
S06psp_5u:1095: katamaṃ dharmaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati yaṃ sākṣātkṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:1096: iyaṃ bhagavann anupalambhacarir bodhisattvacarir yatra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmair anandhakāratām anuprāpnoti.
S06psp_5u:1097: saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_5u:1098: evañ caraṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:1099: sa caran nimittam api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1101: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyata iti na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_5u:1102: tasya khalu punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1103: dūrīkariṣyāmi śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vāsanno 'smi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. iti svabhāvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1104: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati kasyacid,
S06psp_5u:1105: ahaṃ dūre vābhyāse vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1106: abhedatvād bhagavann ākāśasya. evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1107: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06psp_5u:1108: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1111: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1112: māyākāro vā na mama dūre māyākāro mamābhyāse,
S06psp_5u:1113: yaḥ punar evaṃ janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūre nābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1114: avikalpatvād bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya. evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1115: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1117: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1119: ye punar atra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūre. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1121: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1122: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1124: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1126: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1127: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate. iti pratipakṣavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1128: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavikalpaprahīṇa evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvavikalpaprahīṇā avikalpatām upādāya. iti svādhigamavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1129: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1130: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1132: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1133: srāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1135: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatena yo nirmitaḥ sa yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca nirmino 'vikalpo (PSP_5:50)
S06psp_5u:1136_0: nirvikalpaḥ. evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_5u:1136_1: bhāvayati tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā ca prajñāpāramitāvikalpā nirvikalpā. iti kāritravikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1137: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt strīvigraho vā puruṣavigraho vā hastivigraho vā balīvardavigraho vā,
S06psp_5u:1138_0: sa ca yantrayukto yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca yantrayukto
S06psp_5u:1138_1: 'vikalpo nirvikalpaḥ. evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_5u:1138_2: prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā prajñāpāramitā avikalpā nirvikalpā.
S06psp_5u:1138_3: iti kriyāsāphalyavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidhaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1139: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1140: kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:1141: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etd avocat:
S06psp_5u:1144: kiyanto buddhā bhagavataḥ paryupāsitā bhagavaṃs tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:1146: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitās taiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā bhavitavyā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1148: kiyat tair bhagavan kuśalamūlaṃ kṛtaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:1150: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte na sā kācid dānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
S06psp_5u:1154: na sā kācid dhyānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
S06psp_5u:1155: na sā kācit prajñāpāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1157: āścaryam etad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1161_0: āścaryam etat subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1161_1: tadyathāpi nāma sūryācandramasau maṇḍale caturṣu dvīpeṣu kāryaṃ kurvāte caturo dvīpān anugacchataḥ,
S06psp_5u:1162: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti pañca pāramitā anugacchanti,
S06psp_5u:1164: prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yathā rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnair na rājā cakravartīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06psp_5u:1165: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitā virahitatvāt prajñāpāramitayā na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante.
S06psp_5u:1167: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte apuruṣā strī sudharṣaṇā bhavati dhūrtakānām,
S06psp_5u:1168: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt sudharṣaṇā bhavanti māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:1170: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ puruṣaḥ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne durdharṣo bhavati rājanyair vā pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair vā,
S06psp_5u:1171_0: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād durdharṣā bhavanti māreṇa
S06psp_5u:1171_1: vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir ādhimānikair vā pudgalair yāvad evaṃ bodhisattvacaṇḍālair
S06psp_5u:1171_2: vā pañca pāramitā durdharṣā bhavanti. iti pratipattivaikalyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1172: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte koṭṭarājāno rājñaś cakravartino 'nuvidheyā bhavanti so 'yaṃ prātarupasthāno yo gacchanti,
S06psp_5u:1173: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti. iti parapratyayamāyitvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1174: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kācit kunadyaḥ sarvās tā yena gaṅgānadī tenānugacchanti tā gaṅgānadyā sārdhaṃ mahāsamudram upayānti,
S06psp_5u:1175: evam eva pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti. ity uddeśanivṛttivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1176: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇo hastaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoty,
S06psp_5u:1179: evaṃ pañca pāramitā draṣṭavyāḥ. iti prādeśikakāritravikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1180: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yac ca kunadīnāṃ yac ca mahānadīnām udakaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ mahāsamudrapraviṣṭam ekarasaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:1181: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā anupraviṣṭāḥ pāramitā nāmadheyaṃ labhante. ity adhigamanānātvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1182: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasya cakraratnam agrato gacchati,
S06psp_5u:1183: tiṣṭhati ca yatra rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī balakāyam arpayati na ca cakraratnaṃ sthānataś calati,
S06psp_5u:1184: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pariṇāyikā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti,
S06psp_5u:1185: tatra sthāsyanti tatra sthitvā sthānato nātikrāmanti. iti sthānaprasthānāsthānavikalpaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1186: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ sapariṇāyakaratnaṃ sagṛhapatiratnaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyāgrato gacchaty,
S06psp_5u:1187: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāgrato gacchaty agrato gatvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena tiṣṭhati. na ca prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1194: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā evaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:1195: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām anugaccheyam iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1196: svabhāva āsām akiṃcitsamarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyas tuccho marīcisamaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1197: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1198_0: yadā bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1198_1: caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1200: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1204: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmīti,
S06psp_5u:1206: arthāyādhyātmabahirdhāvastu parityajati tasya ca parityajata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1207: na kiṃcit parityaktam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1209: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati. teṣāñ ca sattvānām arthāya dauḥśīlyasyāvakāśaṃ na dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1210: na hy etan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yo 'ham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kuryām,
S06psp_5u:1211: evam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ piśunavacanaṃ paruṣavacanam abaddhapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ kuryāṃ,
S06psp_5u:1213: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāyaikacittotpādam api na kṣobhayati,
S06psp_5u:1214: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāñ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya kauśīdyacittaṃ notpādayati,
S06psp_5u:1216: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati. sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya vikṣiptacitto na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1218: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati. sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na jātu prajñāpāramitāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1219: yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1220: na hy anyathā śakyāḥ sattvāḥ paripācayitum anyatra prajñayety arthavaśenaivam arthaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:1221: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1223: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate 'nuttarākhyāyate?
S06psp_5u:1228_0: nemāḥ pañca pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labheran prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ subhūte āgamya imāḥ
S06psp_5u:1228_1: pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ
S06psp_5u:1230: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamya pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
S06psp_5u:1239: tathā hy āsāṃ svabhāvo nāsty anena kāraṇena svabhāvo na prajñāyate.
S06psp_5u:1241: yadi bhagavann arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:1242_0: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1242_1: śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttāmākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1245: arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate. api tu khalu punar lokavyavahārasaṃketam upādāya dānapāramitā prajñaptā,
S06psp_5u:1249: dhyānapāramitā prajñaptā sattvānāṃ saṃsārataḥ parimocanāya. te ca sattvā na jāyante na mriyante na cyavante nopapadyante,
S06psp_5u:1250_0: sattvāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā. anena subhūte kāraṇenāsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ
S06psp_5u:1250_2: praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:1251_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kāścana striyas tāsāṃ strīratnam agram ākhyāyate jyeṣṭham
S06psp_5u:1251_1: ākhyāyate śreṣṭham ākhyāyate varam ākhyāyate pravaram ākhyāyate praṇītam ākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1251_2: uttamam ākhyāyate anuttamam ākhyāyate niruttamam ākhyāyate asamam ākhyāyate asamasamam
S06psp_5u:1251_3: ākhyāyate. evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1251_4: jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1253: ka eṣa bhagavann abhiprāyo yat prajñāpāramitā agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate (PSP_5:55)
S06psp_5u:1254: praṇītākhyāyate' uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate?
S06psp_5u:1256_0: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā sarvān kuśalān dharmān gṛhītvā yena sarvākārajñatā
S06psp_5u:1256_1: tena sthāsyaty asthānayogena. iti pṛṣṭato niryāṇavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1258: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā?
S06psp_5u:1260: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1261: tathā hi subhūte sarvadharmā agṛhītā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1263: tat katamān bhagavan sarvadharmān prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati?
S06psp_5u:1265: rūpaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati,
S06psp_5u:1266: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:1267_0: vijñānaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ
S06psp_5u:1267_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ
S06psp_5u:1267_4: buddhadharmān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ subhūte prajñapāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
S06psp_5u:1273: yaḥ subhūte rūpasyāmanasikāro vedanāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃjñāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃskārāṇām amanasikāro vijñānasyāmanasikāraḥ,
S06psp_5u:1282: yāvad yo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher amanasikāraḥ. evaṃ hy etat subhūte rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:1287: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā na manasikartavyāni,
S06psp_5u:1288_2: buddhadharmā na manasikartavyāḥ sarvākārajñatā na manasikartavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavan rūpam amanasikṛtvā,
S06psp_5u:1292_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ
S06psp_5u:1297: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:1300: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāparamāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1304: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlāni vivardhiṣyante yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1306_0: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārāṃ vijñanam amanasikṛtvā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān
S06psp_5u:1309: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena rūpam amanasikāraṃ,
S06psp_5u:1316: amanasikāreṇa hi na śliṣyate kāmadhātau na śliṣyate rūpadhātau na śliṣyate ārūpyadhātāv amanasikāreṇa na kvacic chliṣyate,
S06psp_5u:1317: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na kvacid dharme śliṣyate. iti traidhātukāśleṣavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1319: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kvacit sthāsyati.
S06psp_5u:1321: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:1324: evaṃ caran skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:1325_0: sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
S06psp_5u:1326: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām api na tiṣṭhati. iti sthānavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1328: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatrāpi na tiṣṭhati?
S06psp_5u:1332: tathā hi sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati yatrābhiniviśeta vā tiṣṭhed vā,
S06psp_5u:1333: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty anabhiniveśyāsthānayogena. iti bhāvābhāvavikalpābhiniveśavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1335: ya evaṃ bhāvayaty evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:1336: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi. saced evaṃ saṃjānīte dūrīkaroti prajñāpāramitāṃ,
S06psp_5u:1338: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā dūrībhavati,
S06psp_5u:1343: na ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kaścid abhiniveśo 'sti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1344: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yatrābhiniviśateḥ.
S06psp_5u:1345_0: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām api saṃjānīte cyuto bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:1345_1: mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyā yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati sarvadharmeṣu carati. saced asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1353: na khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitena śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_5u:1354: sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavatīha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyākariṣyaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1355: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitām abhinirhariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1365: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1369: na hy ādhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatācyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
S06psp_5u:1373: na hi sarvākārajñatā cyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
S06psp_5u:1376: aparigṛhītās tathāgatena sarvadharmāḥ svayam abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyākhyātā deśitāḥ prakāśitāś,
S06psp_5u:1377: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1378: na hi tathāgatena kaścid dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1382: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1383: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ime doṣā na bhavanti?
S06psp_5u:1385: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evañ jānāti,
S06psp_5u:1389: saced aparigrahadharmam abhinivaśate virahitaḥ prajñāpāramitayā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1390: na hi prajñāpāramitābhiniveśena vartitavyā. iti śaktivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1417: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam iti nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:1421: idaṃ vijñānam asya vijñānam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:1422: ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny asya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ceti,
S06psp_5u:1424: ime sarvadharmā asya sarvadharmāḥ. rūpaṃ nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1426: vijñānaṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1428: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1429: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1430: na hi dharmo nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā saṃvidyate,
S06psp_5u:1432_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1432_1: vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1432_2: sthāsyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgabalakāyo yena yena
S06psp_5u:1433: evam eva subhūte yena yena prajñāpāramitā gacchati tena tenemāḥ pañca pāramitā anuvartante,
S06psp_5u:1434: yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyanti. iti yathecchagamanavyāghātavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1436: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sārathiś caturaṅgam abhiruhya satmārgeṇa gacchati,
S06psp_5u:1437: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā sārathyaṃ karoti samyagmārgeṇa yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchati. ity uktā uddeśaniryāṇavikalpāḥ
S06psp_5u:1444: sarvākārajñatāmārgo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ. imau subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgāmārgau. iti mārgāmārgajñānavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1446: mahākṛtyena bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā. evaṃ nayati praṇayati,
S06psp_5u:1450: mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:1452: praṇayati, ayaṃ mārgo 'yam amārga iti. aprameyāṇam asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyena pratyupasthitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:1453: na kaścit subhūte praṇayati na rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:1454: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:1456: na śrāvakabhūmer vā na pratyekabudddhabhūmer vā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:1457: sā khalu punar iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāyikānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_5u:1459: sarvākārajñatāyāś copanāyikā. evam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā dharmasthititāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya.
S06psp_5u:1461: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā,
S06psp_5u:1462: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ?
S06psp_5u:1474_0: sarvākārajñatām ārambaṇīkṛtya prajñā bhāvayitavyā. tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_5u:1474_1: tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_5u:1474_2: pariṇāmayitavyāni. tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1477_0: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imān kuśalān dharmān anuttarāyai
S06psp_5u:1477_1: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayataḥ ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvad bodhisattvasya
S06psp_5u:1477_2: mahāsattvasya maitrībhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanā paripūriṅ
S06psp_5u:1477_3: gacchati. yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1478_0: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu
S06psp_5u:1478_1: pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyam. ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:1478_2: mahāsattvaḥ sarvān kuśalān dharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati, tasmād (PSP_5:63)
S06psp_5u:1479: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1482: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ?
S06psp_5u:1488: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na visaṃyuktāni,
S06psp_5u:1491: sarvākārajñatā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1493: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpe sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1494: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06psp_5u:1496: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1497: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1498: evaṃ na sarvapāramitāsu sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1499_0: na sarvaśūnyatāsu na saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_5u:1500: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1501: na hi rūpaṃ vā kvacit sthitaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1502: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_5u:1504: na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā kvacit sthitāni,
S06psp_5u:1505_0: evaṃ na pāramitā na śūnyatā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_5u:1506: na sarvākārajñatā kvacit sthitā. evam asthānayogena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir (PSP_5:64)
S06psp_5u:1508: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa āmraphalāni vā panasaphalaṃ vā bhakṣayitukāmaḥ syāt tenāmraphalaṃ panasaphalaṃ vāvaropayitavyam,
S06psp_5u:1510: tasyānupūrveṇa saṃbaddhyamānasya stambasya sāmagrī labhamānasy āmraphalair vā panasaphalair vā sāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1511_0: sa tāny āmraphalāni vā parasaphalāni vā bhakṣiṣyati. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:1511_1: mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā
S06psp_5u:1511_2: sattvān dānenānugrahīṣyati śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena prajñayānugrahīṣyati sattvān
S06psp_5u:1513: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena,
S06psp_5u:1518: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadasi.
S06psp_5u:1520: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi,
S06psp_5u:1521: sarvadharmavaśitām anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi. iti prārthanābhāvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1525: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudraḥ sarvaratnānāṃ sarvasaritāṃ mukhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1528: sarvadharmā hi prajñāpāramitā bhāvitāḥ prajñāpāramitā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:1529: tasmāt tarhi śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattvayānikair vā pudgalair ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1530_0: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
S06psp_5u:1530_1: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
S06psp_5u:1531: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1534_1: śikṣitavyam aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:1535: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte iṣvastrācāryo yathānurūpaṃ dhanur gṛhītvā durādharṣo bhavati pratyarthikānāṃ vā pratyamitrāṇāṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:1536_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran durādharṣo bhavati
S06psp_5u:1536_1: mārair vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhis tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:1537: taṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran tam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_5u:1538: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1539: kathaṃ bhagavan buddhā bhagavanto dānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06psp_5u:1540: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1541: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1542: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1543: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1544: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1545: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1546: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1547_1: caran tam abhijñāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran taṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_5u:1548: kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06psp_5u:1549: evam utkte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1550: iha subhūte atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1551: tathā ca samanvāharanti yatra naiva dānaṃ na śīlan na kṣāntir na vīryan na dhyānaṃ na prajñopalabhyate. evam anupalambhena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1552: yatra nādhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhyante, yatra (PSP_5:66)
S06psp_5u:1554: yatra sarvākārajñatā nopalabhyate. evam anupalambhayogena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_5u:1555: punar aparaṃ subhūte buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ na rūpataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1556: na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato,
S06psp_5u:1558: na skandhato na dhātuto nāyatanato na pratītyasamutpādato na pratītyasamutpādāṅgataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1559: na dānapāramitāto na śīlapāramitāto na kṣāntipāramitāto na vīryapāramitāto na dhyānapāramitāto na prajñāpāramitātaḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1564: na sarvākārajñatātaḥ samanvāharanti. iti pratyarthikadharmopalambhavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhakavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1565: atha khalu subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1566: yat tvaṃ kauśikaivaṃ vadasi gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:1567: duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:1568: śūnyeṣu kauśika sarvadharmeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_5u:1569: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1570: yadyad eva subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati sarvan tac chūnyatām evārabhya nirdiśati na kvacit sajjati,
S06psp_5u:1571: tadyathāpi nāmeṣur antarīkṣe kṣipto na kvacit sajjati,
S06psp_5u:1572: evam eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya dharmadeśanā na kvacit sajjati.
S06psp_5u:1573: atha khalu sakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1574: kaccid ahaṃ bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśann uktavādī ca bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ samyag vyākurvan vyākaromi?
S06psp_5u:1576: samyak khalu tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśaṃs tathāgatasyoktavādī ca dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ (PSP_5:67)
S06psp_5u:1579: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti sarvan tac chūnyatāṃ caivārabhya pratibhāti,
S06psp_5u:1585: evam ukte bhagavān śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1586: subhūtiḥ kauśika sthaviraḥ śūnyatāyāṃ viharan dānapāramitāñ caiva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1587: kaḥ punar vādo ye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti prajñāpāramitāñ caiva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1588: kaḥ punar vādo ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti. smṛtyupasthānāny eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1589: kaḥ punar vādo ye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:1593: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:1595: kaḥ punar vādo ya āryasatyāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:1599: kaḥ punar vādo ye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:1603: kaḥ punar vādo ye balāni bhāvayanti vaiśāradyāny eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1604: kaḥ punar vādo ye vaiśāradyāny abhinirharanti,
S06psp_5u:1606: kaḥ punar vādo ye pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharanti abhijñā eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1609: kaḥ punar vādo ye mahākaruṇāvihāraṃ bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:1611: kaḥ punar vādo ye āveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān abhinirharanti,
S06psp_5u:1613: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante, (PSP_5:68)
S06psp_5u:1615: kaḥ punar vādo ye sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti,
S06psp_5u:1617: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathāgato bhavaty anutpādam eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1618: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nutpādaṃ sākṣāt kurvanti,
S06psp_5u:1620: kaḥ punar vādo yeṣāṃ lakṣaṇāni kāye bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:1622: kaḥ punar vādo yeṣām anuvyañjanāni kāye bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1624_0: anupalambhavihārī śūnyatāvihāry ānimittavihāry apraṇihitavihārī kauśika ya eṣa subhūteḥ
S06psp_5u:1624_1: sthavirasya vihāraḥ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato vihārasya
S06psp_5u:1624_2: śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kotītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm
S06psp_5u:1624_3: api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām
S06psp_5u:1624_4: apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1625_0: tathā hi tathāgatavihāraṃ sthāpayitvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06psp_5u:1625_1: carato yo vihāraḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca ye vihārās teṣāṃ vihārāṇām ayaṃ
S06psp_5u:1625_2: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato yo vihāraḥ so 'gra ākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:1633: niruttama ākhyāyate. tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāgratāṃ gantukāmenānena vihāreṇa vihartavyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1634: atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati,
S06psp_5u:1638: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāno bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_5u:1639_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi devās trayastriṃśā māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantam

S06psp_5u:2304: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nopalabhate sūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:2306: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,

S06psp_5u:2309_1: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadyad eva dānan dadāty annaṃ
S06psp_5u:2309_2: vā pānaṃ vā śayanaṃ vā āvasathaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā vastraṃ vā
S06psp_5u:2309_3: suvarṇaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāpravālādīni vā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapaṭākā

S06psp_5u:2310: yo vā dadāti yasyaivā dadāti tad api śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2311: tasya mātsaryacittasya codgrahacittasya vāvakāśo na bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06psp_5u:2315: tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato mātsaryacittaṃ vā udgrahacittaṃ vā nopapadyate,
S06psp_5u:2316: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:2317: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2318: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2321: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:2323: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?

S06psp_5u:2328: yac chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati,

S06psp_5u:2338: ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tena ca śīlena na kaścid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā,

S06psp_5u:2345: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?

S06psp_5u:2349_1: vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā tasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya
S06psp_5u:2349_2: yadi sarvasattvā āgamyākroṣayur vā paribhāṣeran vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadyuś
S06psp_5u:2352: na iha kaścid dharma ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā,
S06psp_5u:2353: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2354: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2357: kutra vā parinamayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:2359: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigarhnāti?

S06psp_5u:2384: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:2386: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā,
S06psp_5u:2388: yāvantaḥ kecit samādhayaḥ śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā tān sarvān samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,

S06psp_5u:2391_1: vimokṣaḥ. śūnyatvenādhimuktaḥ śūnyatve cādhimukto bhavaty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ. sukhasya

S06psp_5u:2403_4: anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati. sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād

S06psp_5u:2508_0: evaṃ sarvapāramitānāṃ vā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
S06psp_5u:2508_2: vā sarvākārajñatāyā vā saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ tathatāṃ jānānaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2514_0: na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate iyaṃ sā tathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_5u:2514_1: śikṣitavyam. evaṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2518: akoṭir bhūtakoṭir atra koṭyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati,
S06psp_5u:2519: evaṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2523: ākāśadhātur dharmadhātur yasya dhātor na cchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ. evaṃ ca dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2527: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ.
S06psp_5u:2529: katame bhagavan sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
S06psp_5u:2534: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na (PSP_5:106)
S06psp_5u:2536: evaṃ yāvat saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛto dhatur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2537: na hy asyāsti svabhāvo yaḥ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā yaś cāsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo,
S06psp_5u:2538: yaś cābhāvaḥ so 'bhāvena sārdhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyukta,
S06psp_5u:2541: ayaṃ punar bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyātra hi bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepapāramitāyām ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2543: ihaiva punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣimāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2548: kasyacin na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo,
S06psp_5u:2549_0: na khalu kuśīdasyāyaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasyāyaṃ
S06psp_5u:2549_1: praveśaḥ ārabdhavīryasyākuśīdasyopasthitasmṛter ayaṃ praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya cāvinivartanīyabhūmau
S06psp_5u:2549_2: sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya cāyaṃ praveśaḥ. iti saṃkṣepavistarājñānavikalpau
S06psp_5u:2550: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:2551: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān anuprāpsyaty,
S06psp_5u:2555: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicit mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_5u:2557_0: tasmād upāyakauśalyaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:2557_1: caritavyam. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:2559: tasmin samaye 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ (PSP_5:107)
S06psp_5u:2560: ca deśayanti te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2561: ato nirjātā hi subhūte 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto yad uta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2562: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam,
S06psp_5u:2563_0: aham apy enān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi ye tair atītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
S06psp_5u:2563_1: anuprāptāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ yogam āpattavyam,
S06psp_5u:2564_0: evaṃ prayujyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:2564_1: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāvirahitena
S06psp_5u:2564_2: bhavitavyam. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyām
S06psp_5u:2565: sa khhalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2566_0: na tv eva ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec
S06psp_5u:2566_1: chīle pratiṣṭhāpayet kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayed vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet
S06psp_5u:2566_2: prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_5u:2567: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2568_1: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ. ye 'pi
S06psp_5u:2568_2: te buddhā bhagavanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:2569: te 'pito nirjātā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ. ye 'pi te subhūte ' tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'pīta eva prabhāvitā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ.
S06psp_5u:2570_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ
S06psp_5u:2570_1: vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā saṃvatsaraśataṃ vā kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyān api
S06psp_5u:2570_2: kalpāni māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair bhāvayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2571_0: sa bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. na tv eva ye gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_5u:2571_1: sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec chīle kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:2577: ato nirjātā hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair idaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastuprajñāptaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2580: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prajñāptam.
S06psp_5u:2582: yaḥ punar aparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2583: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2584: upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2586: ṣaṭpāramitāvatīrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. viṃśatiśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2590: kumārabhūtaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. abhiprāyaparipūrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2592: kuśalamūlair avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. anākṣiptapratibhānaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2593: dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. rūpapariniṣpattis tasya pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2594_0: vyākaraṇasaṃpanno gotrasaṃpannaḥ saṃcintyabhavaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:2595: vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalo vijñānakuśalaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgakuśalo (PSP_5:109)
S06psp_5u:2598: sarvākārajñatā manasikārakuśalaḥ. rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2606: bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2613: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2625: itīme 'nuśaṃsāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ.
S06psp_5u:2634: rūpaśāntatayā subhūte rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchatayā rūpāsāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2646: kiyac ciraṃ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇo bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2655: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃś cittāntarānām avakāśan dadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:2657: anyeṣāṃ subhūte manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2662: tathā ca caritavyā tathā cābhinirhartavyā tathā ca bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2665: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām abhinirharan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:2697: yathātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ.
S06psp_5u:2699: kathaṃ bhagavan tathatā bhūtakoṭidharmadhātur ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ?
S06psp_5u:2702: subhūte api nu sa ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poso vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:2706: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jīvaṃ vā jantuṃ vā poṣaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:2707: kathaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vā yāvat pudgaladhātuṃ vā prajñāpayiṣyati. evaṃ prajñāpāramitām apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvadharmān apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_5u:2717: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā yāvad buddhadharmā vā.
S06psp_5u:2725: srotaāpannā vā sakṛdāgāmino vānāgāmino vārhanto vā pratyekabuddhā vā samyaksaṃbuddhā vā prajñāyante.
S06psp_5u:2732: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvaṃ kuto nārakaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati tiryagyonigatān,
S06psp_5u:2733: yamalokaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā devaṃ vā srotaāpannān vā sakṛdāgāmino vā anāgāmino vā arhato vā pratyekabuddhān vā samyaksaṃbuddhān vā kutaḥ prajñāpayiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:2734: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam. iti sattvaprajñāptivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2736: na nu bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2775: kathaṃ bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:2780: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo,
S06psp_5u:2782: evaṃ rūpaṃ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmāḥ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2786: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2787: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:2792: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:2797: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:2816: āveṇikā buddhadharmā āveṇikaiḥ buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2817: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:2821: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. evaṃ yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā. tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carir bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2827: tathā hi subhūte sā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:2833: tad api nopalabhyate. evaṃ hi subhūte acarir bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācarir yatraite sarvaprapañcā nopalabhyante.
S06psp_5u:2835: yadi bhagavan na cariḥ prajñāpāramitācarir bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2836: tat kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:2838: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāyānupalambheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2847_1: smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayatānupalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayi tavyāni. evaṃ
S06psp_5u:2854: āveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayatānupalambhayogena āveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2863: kiyatā bhagavan dvayaṃ vā advayaṃ vā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2870: na bodhiś ca na buddhaś ca,
S06psp_5u:2880_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte upalambhānupalabdhisamatānupalambhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte
S06psp_5u:2880_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:2882: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalambhe sajjati nānupalambhe,
S06psp_5u:2883: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2886: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhe sthitvā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_5u:2887: na copalarabhe sthitvā śaktyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2890: so 'pi nopalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyam. iti śaktivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2892: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate. tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā dharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06psp_5u:2910: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:2924: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2927_0: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin nopalabhate. tat kathaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ
S06psp_5u:2927_1: paripūrya kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrya vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya
S06psp_5u:2930: sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2934: na subhūte bodhisattvo rūpasya kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:2935: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_5u:2937: na skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ na pratītyasamutpādasya na pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:2939: na śūnyatāmukhānāṃ na bodhipakṣyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtena,
S06psp_5u:2944: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:2946: na kasyacit kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2947: tathā hi subhūte 'kṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2949: bodhisattvo 'py akṛto 'vikṛto 'nabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛtāvikṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānabhisaṃskārayogena.
S06psp_5u:2952: yadi bhagavann akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2953: kathaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2957: na subhūte 'kṛtānām avikṛtānām anabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:2958: anabhisaṃskṛtānām anabhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ ca nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2980: bodhipakṣyān dharmān manyate bodhipakṣyān dharmān upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2987: bodhiṃ manyate bodhim upalabhate. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:2989: ahaṃ sattvān parimocayiṣyāmi saṃsārataḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2990: tathā hi subhūte yad buddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2999: tatsamohapuruṣo buddhvā vākhyāya sattvān icchati saṃsārāt parimocayitum.
S06psp_5u:3000: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3002_0: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhās te sattvā yān
S06psp_5u:3002_1: āsaṃsārāt parimocayed iti. tat katham idānīṃ bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_5u:3002_2: sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ samyaktvaniyatā vā mithyātvaniyatā vāniyatā vā?
S06psp_5u:3004: na mayā subhūte 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kathaṃcid api sattva upalabdhaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3006: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñinas tāṃs tato abhūtagrahād dhārayāmi lokavyavahāreṇa naḥ punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_5u:3008: na punar bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
S06psp_5u:3011: yadi bhagavatā naiva paramārthe sthitvānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_5u:3013: katham idānīṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:3016: sā ca na kvacit sthitā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau,
S06psp_5u:3017: sa ca tathāgatanirmito gacchati cāgacchati ca tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca,
S06psp_5u:3025_0: caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiś caturbhiḥ
S06psp_5u:3025_1: smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ
S06psp_5u:3025_2: pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa śūnyatāsamādhinā animittasamādhināpraṇihitasamādhinā (PSP_5:121)
S06psp_5u:3027_0: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś
S06psp_5u:3027_1: catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā samādhidhāraṇīmukhair aṣṭādaśabhir
S06psp_5u:3028: sa ca nirmito 'parimāṇān sattvān abhinirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:3029: subhūte 'pi nu tena kaścit sattvas triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtaḥ.
S06psp_5u:3033: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā,
S06psp_5u:3034: na ca kaścit sattvo vinītaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:3041: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tathāgatasya nirmitasya ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ?
S06psp_5u:3044: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3045: tathāgatasya ca subhūte nirmitasya ca na kaścid viśeṣo,
S06psp_5u:3047: nirviśeṣaḥ subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3048: tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti,
S06psp_5u:3051: kaccit punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06psp_5u:3055: kathaṃ yathā punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate tathāgatanirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06psp_5u:3057: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sacet tathāgato bhavyasattvam anupalabhamāno nirmitan nirmāya parinirvṛtaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3058: tena ca nirmitenārdhakalpaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ sa paścād buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā parinirvṛta iti janaḥ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3059: na ca nirmitānāṃ kaścid utpādo na nirvāṇam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ, (PSP_5:122)
S06psp_5u:3060: yad uta nirmitopamān sarvadharmān adhimucyate. iti yānatrayavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3062: yadi bhagavan nirmitasya tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti dakṣiṇā pariśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_5u:3063: ya ime bhagavaṃs tathāgate dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:3064: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyante,
S06psp_5u:3065: evam eva ye nirmite dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:3066: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
S06psp_5u:3068: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgataḥ sadevakasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3069: tayaiva dharmatayā nirmito 'pi sadevasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ. tiṣṭhatu tāvat subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā,
S06psp_5u:3070: tiṣṭhatu nirmitapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataṃ maitratayā manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:3071_0: sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati. tiṣṭhatu
S06psp_5u:3071_1: maitraṃ vā manasikāro yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ākāśe puṣpāṇi
S06psp_5u:3071_2: kṣepsyati tathāgataṃ manasikṛtvā sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya
S06psp_5u:3073: tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpāṇi yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā namo buddhānām iti manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:3074: sarvo 'sāv anupūrveṇa duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati. evaṃ maharddhikā subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā,
S06psp_5u:3076: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3077: tathāgatasya ca tathāgatanirmitasya ca na kiṃcit nānākaraṇam upalabhyate dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtyam. iti dakṣiṇāviśuddhivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3078: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3082: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā iyaṃ dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:3083: evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmeṣv ime sarvadharmā iyaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmateti na vikopayitavyā.
S06psp_5u:3085: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇān dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:3086: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitaṃ rūpam idam,
S06psp_5u:3097: evaṃ kuśalā dharmā evam akuśalā dharmāḥ sāsravā anāsravā laukikā lokottarās sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3098: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavet?
S06psp_5u:3100: nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭā dharmāṇāṃ sūcanakṛtā,
S06psp_5u:3101: kathaṃ paro 'vatariṣyatiti na dharmāṇān dharmatā vikopitā bhavet.
S06psp_5u:3103: yadi bhagavan nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ pareṣām avatāraṇāya,
S06psp_5u:3104: kathaṃ bhagavarm anāmakā animittāḥ sarvadharmā nāma nimittena vyāhṛtāḥ?
S06psp_5u:3108: na subhūte vyavahāro nāmanimittam abhiniveśo vā nātra subhūte nāmni vyavaharāmi,
S06psp_5u:3109: na nimitte 'nimitte 'bhiniveśo vā. na hi subhūte tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmni nimitte vābhiniviśate. na hi subhūte nāma nāmny abhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:3119: na hy ete nāmamātre 'vatiṣṭhante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmamātre sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3123: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavati,
S06psp_5u:3146: tat kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavatīti,
S06psp_5u:3148: tac ca nāma nāmnā śūnyaṃ nimittaṃ nimittena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3149: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:3151: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati,
S06psp_5u:3152: tasya ca nāmanimittasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06psp_5u:3159: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā,
S06psp_5u:3162: āsāṃ bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇam?
S06psp_5u:3168: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya?
S06psp_5u:3170: yāvantaḥ subhūte ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittais te dharmāḥ sūcyante,
S06psp_5u:3171: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tathāgatenānubaddhāni tenocyate tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvākārajñatā. iti sarvākārajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3173: kena kāraṇena bhagavan mārgajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām?
S06psp_5u:3180: ye ca bodhimārgās te ca mārgāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ taiś ca mārge mārgakaraṇīyaṃ kartavyan na cānena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06psp_5u:3182: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭir na sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:3184: nāparipūrya praṇidhānaṃ nāparipācya sattvān nāpariśodhya buddhakṣetran tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā,
S06psp_5u:3185: tena kāraṇenocyate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgajñatā. iti mārgākārajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3189: etāvad eva subhūte sarvaṃ yāvad evādhyātmikāś ca bāhyāś ca dharmās te ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair jñātā,
S06psp_5u:3190: na punaḥ sarvamārgeṇa sarvākāreṇa. iti sarvajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3192: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārge sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:3204: tat katham idānīṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:3207: subhūte api nu tava mārge sthitasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam.
S06psp_5u:3223: api tu khalu punar me bhagavaṃś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ yathā na kvacit sthitvā syām.
S06psp_5u:3225: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacit sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06psp_5u:3227: yāḥ punar imā bhagavan sarvākārajñatā ca mārgajñatā ca sarvajñatā ca kaccid bhagavann āsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
S06psp_5u:3235: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvajñatāyām anuprāptāyām aśeṣaprahāṇam asaṃskṛtaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_5u:3239: kiṃ punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate?
S06psp_5u:3253: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3257: ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:3259: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ bhāvayati api tu lokavyavahāraṃ pramāṇīkṛtyocyate na punaḥ paramārthena śakyā prabhāvanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3261: api tu khalu punar yaiḥ pūrvānto vyavacchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭiprajñāptā.
S06psp_5u:3267: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:3270: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye te sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_5u:3271: teṣām evaṃ nirdiṣṭam iyaṃ pūrvā koṭir iyaṃ paścimā koṭir,
S06psp_5u:3272: na punaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu pūrvā koṭir na paścimā koṭir upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:3273: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3274: svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caran na kvacid abhiniviśate 'dhyātmikeṣu vā bāhyeṣu vā saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu vā śrāvakadharmeṣu vā pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu vā.
S06psp_5u:3275: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3279_0: paramapāramitaiṣā subhūte sarvadharmāṇām agamanārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate. api
S06psp_5u:3279_1: tu khalu punaḥ subhūte etayā prajñāpāramitayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś
S06psp_5u:3279_2: ca mahāsattvās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pāraṅgatās tenārthena prajñāpāramitety
S06psp_5u:3279_3: ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte paramārthena yo 'rthaḥ sarvadharmāṇām abhinnaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3280: sa iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S06psp_5u:3281: sarvadharmeṣu pāro nopalabdhas tenārthenocyate prajñāpāramitā. iti mārgasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3282: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathatāntargatā,
S06psp_5u:3284_0: dharmadhātur antargataḥ tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte neyaṃ
S06psp_5u:3284_1: prajñāpāramitā kenacid dharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā sanidarśanā vānidarśanā
S06psp_5u:3284_2: vā sapratighā vāpratighā vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3287_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cārikā sarvapratibhānānāṃ
S06psp_5u:3287_1: sarvālokānām anācchedyeyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ
S06psp_5u:3289: yāvan na kenacid anyatīrthikaiḥ pratyamitrair vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śakyā cchettuṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3290: tathā hi te 'tra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nopalabhyante sarva evaivaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam. ity asamatvasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3291: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam anityārthe caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3299: duḥkhaparijñatārthe samudayaprahāṇārthe nirodhasākṣātkriyārthe mārgajñatārthe anvayajñānārthe caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3300_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3301: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3302: yadi bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthaś cānarthaś ca nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:3303: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:3305: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gambhīre 'rthe prajñāpāramitārthe carataivaṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3311: idaṃ dṛṣṭigato me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3312: na hi rāgadveṣamohānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3313: na dṛṣṭigatānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti. rūpaṃ me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3316: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3321: bodhipakṣyā me dharmā artho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3327: anuttarā me samyaksaṃbodhir artho 'nartha iti na caritavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
