S06psp_5u:3569: etad eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3572: tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ tāṃś ca sattvān abhāvasvabhāvān jānāti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3573: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3574: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoty,
S06psp_5u:3575: āryasatyeṣu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhau caran maitrīkaraṇāmuditopekṣāsu caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3577: taṃ ca bodhimārgam abhāvasvabhāvaṃ jānāti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ kurvan,
S06psp_5u:3579: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā sarvākārajñatājñānena ca samanvāgato bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3582: pāramitāḥ paripūrya sarvan tad ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:3585_0: sa buddhacakṣuṣā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vyavalokya bhāvam api nopalabhate
S06psp_5u:3585_1: prāg evābhāvam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam
S06psp_5u:3585_2: abhāvasvabhāvaiḥ sarvadharmair idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3586: yad bhāva iti nopalabhyate prāg evābhāva iti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_5u:3587: sa tad dānam abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3590: abhāva iti saṃjanīte. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_5u:3591: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tām api prajñāpāramitām abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3592: yeṣāṃ prajñā bhāvyate tān apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3593: yo 'pi bhāvayati tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte. evam adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:3596: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃs tām apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3597: yo 'py abhisaṃbudhyate tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3598: yenāpy abhisaṃbudhyate tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3599: yathaiva hīyam abhāvasvabhāvā tathaiva sarvadhrmā abhāvasvabhāvās,
S06psp_5u:3600: te ca buddhair akṛtāḥ śrāvakair akārakāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3603: nanu bhagavan dharmair eva dharmā virahitāḥ?
S06psp_5u:3608: yadi bhagavan dharmair eva dharmā virahitāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3609: kathaṃ bhagavan virahito dharmo virahitaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte bhāvaṃ vā abhāvaṃ vā?
S06psp_5u:3610: na hi bhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3611: na hy abhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3612: na hi bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:3613: na hy abhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte. evam asaṃjānāneṣu dharmeṣu kuta evaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_5u:3614: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā lokasaṃvṛtim upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā nirdiśati,
S06psp_5u:3618: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā lokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ?
S06psp_5u:3621: yaiva lokasaṃvṛtes tathatā saiva paramārthasya tathatā,
S06psp_5u:3622: tān te sattvā evaṃtathatān na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_5u:3623: teṣām arthāya lokasaṃvṛtyā nirdiśyate bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ya ete sattvāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhair bhāvasaṃjñino abhāva iti na jānanti, (PSP_5:139)
S06psp_5u:3625_0: teṣām arthāyaivaṃ nirdiśyate dharmāṇāṃ prabhedatām upādāya katham api bhāvam abhāvaṃ
S06psp_5u:3625_1: vā jñāsyanti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3626: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3627: bodhisattvacaryā bodhisattvacaryeti bhagavann ucyate kasyaitad adhivacanam?
S06psp_5u:3629: bodhisattvacaryeti subhūte bodhaye caryaiṣā bodhicārikā tasmād bodhisattvacaryety ucyate.
S06psp_5u:3631: kva sā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsavasya bodhisattvacaryā?
S06psp_5u:3682: carati, evam atra carati yathā bodhim advayī karoti na dvaidhī karoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhaye carati. iti prayoge vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:3683: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3687: bhūtārtho buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhūtā asya dharmā abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate,
S06psp_5u:3688: bhūto 'syārthaḥ pratividdhas tasmād buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate. iti buddharatne vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:3692: bodhir iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3696_0: dharmadhātor etad adhivacanam. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmadheyamātram etad bodhir
S06psp_5u:3696_1: iti. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte
S06psp_5u:3696_2: bodhis tathatāvitathatānanyatathatānanyathībhāvas tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu
S06psp_5u:3696_3: khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmanimittamātram etad bodhir iti tasmād bodhir ucyate. api tu
S06psp_5u:3696_4: khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhānām eva bhagavatām eṣā bodhis tasmād bodhir ity ucyate.
S06psp_5u:3696_5: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhair eṣā bhagavadbhir abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād bodhir
S06psp_5u:3697: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3698: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
S06psp_5u:3705: kasya dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā?
S06psp_5u:3706: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3707: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
S06psp_5u:3713_0: na kasyacid dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya
S06psp_5u:3713_1: vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā. na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:3713_2: carata ārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā ācaye vā apacaye vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya
S06psp_5u:3713_3: vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_5u:3715: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahyāsattvasya bodhir na kasyacid dharmasyārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:3716: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:3731: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3732: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvayena bodhisattvacarir,
S06psp_5u:3733: na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvayena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3749: yadi bhagavan dānapāramitāyāṃ na dvayena caraty,
S06psp_5u:3750: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na dvayena carati,
S06psp_5u:3755: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate?
S06psp_5u:3756: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3757: ye subhūte dvayena caranti na te vivardhante kuśalamūlair dharmaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3758: dvaye niśritya hi subhūte sarvabālapṛthagjanās te na vivardhate kuśalamūlair dharmair,
S06psp_5u:3759: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar advayena carati tena prathamacittotpādam upādāya kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:3760: yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate. tenānavamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena,
S06psp_5u:3761_0: yair akuśalair dharmair avamarditaḥ samānaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau
S06psp_5u:3761_1: vāpated ity ebhiś cānyaiś cākuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃhriyamāṇo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_5u:3763: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:3765: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:3768: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3770: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:3772: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3776: kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_5u:3778: kathaṃ bhagavan paryupāsya buddhān bhagavataḥ kuśalamulāni (PSP_5:143)
S06psp_5u:3779: paripūrya kalyāṇamitraparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:3781: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāste,
S06psp_5u:3782_0: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam itivṛttakaṃ
S06psp_5u:3782_1: jātakaṃ saṃgrahavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāṃs tān sarvān udgṛhṇāty udgṛhya kāyena
S06psp_5u:3782_2: vācā suparijitān kṛtvā manasā tatprekṣitān karoti,
S06psp_5u:3786: pratisaṃvidbhir utpāditābhis tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi te dharmā na jātu vipraṇasyanti yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_5u:3787: tatra tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kuṣalamūlāny avaropayati,
S06psp_5u:3788: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhīto na jātv apāyair vākṣaṇair votpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3792: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitraiś ca na jātu virahito bhavati buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca ye buddhayānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_5u:3793: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3796: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3797: yaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpi buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
S06psp_5u:3800: mā haiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt.
S06psp_5u:3802: na khalu subhūte buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsyānavaropitakuśalamūlaḥ kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3803_0: buddhān eva tāvad bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā
S06psp_5u:3803_1: bhajitvā paryupāsyaivaṃ kuśalamūlasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām
S06psp_5u:3803_2: anuprāptum asamarthaḥ prāg eva buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny anavaropya
S06psp_5u:3803_3: kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_5u:3806: kuśalamulāni cāvaropitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni.
S06psp_5u:3808: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāni cāvaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā bhaktvā paryupāsya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt?
S06psp_5u:3811_0: ye nopāyena śruto bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt sadharmas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
S06psp_5u:3811_1: nāvaropitāni tāni ca kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitāni bhaktitāni paryupāsitāni yāny asyopāyam
S06psp_5u:3815: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:3816: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3817_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_5u:3817_1: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ
S06psp_5u:3818: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ samanvāgato na cāsya dānasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3821: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3822: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3829: na ca dānaphalam upajīvati yad dānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3830: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati,
S06psp_5u:3831: tasya naiva rāge cittaṃ patati na doṣe na mohe nānuśaye na paryutthāne patati,
S06psp_5u:3833: ye bodhaye paripanthakās tadyathā mātsaryacittaṃ vā dauḥśīlyacittaṃ vā kṣubdhacittaṃ vā kauśīdyacittaṃ vā hīnacittaṃ vā bhrāntacittaṃ (PSP_5:145)
S06psp_5u:3834: vā dauṣprajñacittaṃ vā mānātimāno 'dhimāno 'smimānaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3835: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3836: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3841: sa śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3843: na ca śīlaphalam upajīvati yac chīlaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3844: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:3845: sa svakeṣv api prāṇeṣu vyavaropyamāneṣu na pratidahyate,
S06psp_5u:3847_0: sa jīvitād vyaparopyamāno 'pi sarvasve vāpahriyamāṇe dāre vākṛṣyamāṇe mṛṣāvāda ucyamānaḥ
S06psp_5u:3847_1: piśunaṃ paruṣaṃ saṃbhinnaṃ vocyamāna ākruṣyamāṇo vā tāḍyamāno vā cchidyamāno vā na
S06psp_5u:3847_2: kṣubhyati sattvānām eva hitam utpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3849: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3852: so 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kuśalair dharmair vivardhate sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3853: sa kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3855: na ca kṣāntiphalam upajīvati yat kṣāntiphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3856: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vīryam ārabhate,
S06psp_5u:3857: dṛḍhasaṃnāho dṛḍhaparākramo na kauśīdyaṃ vā alasacittaṃ votpādayati,
S06psp_5u:3858_0: sa bodher arthāya duḥkham api na gaṇapatidakṣo 'nalaso 'pi śaktibhir vāryamāṇo manuṣyaduṣkham
S06psp_5u:3858_1: asuraduḥkhaṃ tiryagyoniduḥkhaṃ narakaduṣkham api na gaṇapatir api śaktibhir vāryamāṇaḥ. tat (PSP_5:146)
S06psp_5u:3860: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3861: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3865: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3867: na ca vīryaphalam upajīvati yad vīryaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3868: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3869: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3870: yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
S06psp_5u:3871: teṣāṃ saṃvarāya pratipadyate rakṣati cakṣurindriyam evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā,
S06psp_5u:3875: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3877: yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ manaindriyenāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
S06psp_5u:3880: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāno 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi samāhitāvasthāṃ na jahāti na vijahāti,
S06psp_5u:3882_0: śāntakāyaḥ śāntavāk śāntacitto rahasyarahasi vāvikalpiteryāpatho yaiḥ kecid apy annapānaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
S06psp_5u:3882_1: saṃtuṣṭaḥ surabhaḥ supoṣyaḥ kalyāṇācāragocaraḥ saṃgaṇikāyā api vivekagocaraḥ lābhe
S06psp_5u:3882_2: 'lābhe ca sa nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ sukhe duṣkhe stutau nindāyāṃ yaśasyayaśasi
S06psp_5u:3882_3: jīvite ca maraṇe ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ,
S06psp_5u:3883: śatrau ca mitre ca sādhau cāsādhau ca manaāpavartiny amanaāpavartiny āryeṣu śabdesv anāryeṣu (PSP_5:147)
S06psp_5u:3884: śabdeṣu vivikteṣu vyavakīrṇeṣu ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ priyāpriyeṣu rūpeṣv anurodhavirodhāpagaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3885: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3886: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3890: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3891: sa dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3893: na dhyānaphalam upajīvati yad dhyānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3894_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam
S06psp_5u:3894_1: upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na duṣprajño bhavati na parapraṇeyo
S06psp_5u:3895: ātmasattva jīvajantu poṣapuruṣa pudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakavigataś ca bhavati sarvadṛṣṭivigataḥ sarvaśūnyatāvigato nirvikalpo nirvikāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3896: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3897: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3902: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3904: na ca prajñāphalam upajīvati yat prajñāphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3905: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3910: prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na ca teṣāṃ vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3911: tathā hi sa tenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3912: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tāni ca dhyānāny apramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamānaḥ sa (PSP_5:148)
S06psp_5u:3914: asadbhutān apariniṣpannan anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3918: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate.
S06psp_5u:3919: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran darśanabhāvanāprahātavye 'smin mārge carati,
S06psp_5u:3921: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3922: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3923: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3927: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06psp_5u:3928: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:3929: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3933: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3934: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3935: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3940: sa vimokṣasamādhisamāpattyāryasatyaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim avakrāmatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikadharmavyākaraṇakṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:3941: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3943: catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca,
S06psp_5u:3946: sarvasattvāś ca na paripācitā bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3947: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3948: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3950: akiṃcitsamarthatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃskāraṃ lakṣaṇam avatarati,
S06psp_5u:3952: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_5u:3953: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3954: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3958: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3960: paramabuddhimantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
S06psp_5u:3961: vipākaṃ ca na pratigṛhṇanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3962: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svabhāvato na calanti.
S06psp_5u:3967: yat punar āyuṣmān subūtir evam āha katamasmāt svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3969: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_5u:3974: śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3975: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3976: apramāṇasvabhāvād dhyānārūpyasamāpattisvabhāvāt smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvāt samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgasvabhāvād āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasvabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3980: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmasvabhāvān na calanti mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāsvabhāvān na calanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3981: tathā hi subhūte ya eṣa dharmo niḥsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:3983: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3984: tat kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:3987: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:3990: tat kiṃ bhagavann abhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:3996: tan mā haiva bhagavan na prāptir nābhisamayo bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_5u:4007: sa tādṛśo 'bhisamayo yatraite prapañcā na saṃvidyante,
S06psp_5u:4010: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4011: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ?
S06psp_5u:4013: rūpan nityam anityam iti vā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4015: vijñānaṃ nityam anityam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4018: vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4024: vijñānaṃ śāntam aśāntam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4025: rūpaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4027: saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4028_1: iti vā prapañcaḥ. duṣkham āryasatyaṃ parijñeyam iti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4036: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayitavyānīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4040: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvam atikramiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4049: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4050: catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān utpādayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4052: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prahāsyāmīti prapañcaḥ. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nityam anityam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:4056: parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:4058: vijñānaṃ nityam anityam aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:4062: parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca nityam anityam iti,
S06psp_5u:4066_0: parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vāprapañcan na prapañcayati. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā
S06psp_5u:4067: srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvapratyekabuddhabodhim atikramiṣyāmity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. sarvākārajñatām atikramiṣyāmity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4070: na hi svabhāvo 'bhāvaṃ vā sthāpayitvā anyat kiñcid upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:4073: yena vā prapañcayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4078_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny
S06psp_5u:4082: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir niṣprapañcā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena niṣprapañcena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:4084: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ niḥprapañcaṃ peyālaṃ yāvad bodhir niṣprapañcā?
S06psp_5u:4085: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4087: nāsti vedanāyā nāsti saṃjñāyā nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti vijñānasya svabhāvo,
S06psp_5u:4088_1: pāramitānāṃ svabhāvo nāsti śūnyatāmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ. evaṃ nāsti bodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_5u:4089: yasya svabhāvaṃ nāsti so 'prapañco 'nena subhūte kāraṇena niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4094: sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā bodhipakṣyā dharmā niṣprapañcāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4098: sarvākārajñatā niṣprapañcā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhi sattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
S06psp_5u:4099: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4100: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāva upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:4101: tat katamena mārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati?
S06psp_5u:4102: kiṃ śrāvakamārgeṇa vā pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā buddhamārgeṇa vā?
S06psp_5u:4103: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4104_0: na subhūte śrāvakamārgeṇa vā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati
S06psp_5u:4104_1: na pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā na buddhamārgeṇa vā. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:4105: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:4107: yāvan na phalamārgam utpādayati. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:4109: yāvan na vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati,
S06psp_5u:4110: tataḥ sa ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. iti viparyāse vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:4111: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4112: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:4114: anyaḥ srotaāpannasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nyo 'nāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyo 'nāgāmino 'nyo 'rhattvapratipannakasyānyo 'rhato mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4117: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati? (PSP_5:154)
S06psp_5u:4118: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgāḥ paripurayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4119: mā khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamako bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:4121: bhāvanāmārgam utpādya sakṛdāgāmitāyai pratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmī bhaviṣyaty,
S06psp_5u:4125: asthānaṃ bhagavann anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamakaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4126: syād aṣṭamako bhūtvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:4130: evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:4133: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kathaṃ bhagavan jānīyāma vayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmatiti?
S06psp_5u:4134: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4136_0: asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamako bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_5u:4136_1: prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ
S06psp_5u:4141: kathaṃ bhagavann etān mārgān prāpya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:4142: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4143: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena ca darśanena cātikrāmati. katamā aṣṭa?
S06psp_5u:4144: yad uta śuklavidarśanābhūmir gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir,
S06psp_5u:4145: ayaṃ bhūminirdeśaḥ. sa imā aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena darśanena cātikramya mārgajñatayā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:4147: sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4148: tathā hi subhūte yad aṣṭamakasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:4149: yaṃ srotaāpannasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:4150: yat sakṛdāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:4151: yad anāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:4152: yad arhato jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:4153_0: yat pratyekabuddhasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:4153_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06psp_5u:4154_0: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatājñānena ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahāti.
S06psp_5u:4154_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgān paripūryānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
S06psp_5u:4154_2: abhisaṃbodhavyā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ phalopabhogena bhavitavyam.
S06psp_5u:4155: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4156: ya ime bhagavan mārgā ākhyātāḥ śrāvakamārgaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgo buddhamārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4159: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatāviśuddhir utpādayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:4160: tatreyaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā mārgākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ. yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvamārgākārajñatā visuddhir bhavati,
S06psp_5u:4161: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvenābhisaṃboddhavyāni,
S06psp_5u:4162: abhisaṃbudhya pareṣām ākhyātavyāni nirdeśayitavyāni prakāśayitavyāni prajñepayitavyāni prasthāpayitavyāni,
S06psp_5u:4163: vivaritavyāni parebhyo vinayārthāya yathā pare jānīyur iti. tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvarutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ samudānayitavyā uccārayitavyāś ca,
S06psp_5u:4164_0: yai rutasaṃketaghoṣaiḥ trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau vijñāpayati yadidaṃ pratiśrutkopamā
S06psp_5u:4164_1: jñānena. tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:4166: nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nairayiko mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca nairayikamārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4170: sattvānāṃ tiryagmārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyo phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca tiryagmārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4172_0: phalato nivārayitavyāḥ. evaṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ mahoragānāṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gandharvāṇām
S06psp_5u:4172_1: asurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ guhyakānāṃ cāraṇānāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ sādhyānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
S06psp_5u:4172_2: mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4173: cāturmahārājakānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4174: brahmapāriṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ mahābrahmāṇo mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam,
S06psp_5u:4175_0: ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānāṃ parīttaśubhānāṃ apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānām
S06psp_5u:4175_1: anubhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisattvānāṃ śuddhāvāsānām aspṛhāṇām
S06psp_5u:4176_1: devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni,
S06psp_5u:4190: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā jñātavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4191: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā jñātavyā. yaiś ca mārgair ye sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:4192: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:4193: ye anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:4195: ye pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā tān pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:4196: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:4198: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sattvānām āśayam avatarati,
S06psp_5u:4199: sattvānām āśayam avatīrya tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yathāsya sā dharmadeśanāmoghākṣaṇā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4200: tathā hy asya puruṣendriye parāparajñānaṃ suvibhaktaṃ suvijñātaṃ ca bhavati,
S06psp_5u:4201: sattvānāṃ gatiṃ cyutim upapattiṃ ca prajānāti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06psp_5u:4202: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ sarvadharmā antargatā,
S06psp_5u:4204: yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiś caritavyaṃ śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:4205: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4206: yadi bhagavan ye bodhipakṣyā dharmā yāvad yā bodhiḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4208: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārikā bhavanti?
S06psp_5u:4209: evaṃ bhagavan na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārikā vāpahārikā vā,
S06psp_5u:4210: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśan na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakaṃ vāpahārakaṃ vā. evam eva bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā.
S06psp_5u:4213: na subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmāḥ kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā,
S06psp_5u:4214: ye vā subhūte sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_5u:4216: ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārakā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:4218_0: api tu khalu subhūte yañ ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca
S06psp_5u:4218_1: vijñānaṃ ye ca skandhā ye ca dhātavo yāni cāyatanāni yaś ca pratītyasamutpādo yāni
S06psp_5u:4218_2: ca pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni yā ca dānapāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca kṣāntipāramitā
S06psp_5u:4218_3: yā ca vīryapāramitā yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā
S06psp_5u:4218_4: yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāva śūnyatā
S06psp_5u:4218_5: yac ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4219: yac cākāśānantyāyatanaṃ yac ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ yac cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ yac ca naivasaṃjñānā saṃjñāyatanaṃ yā ca mahāmaitrī yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca mahāmuditā yā ca (PSP_5:158)
S06psp_5u:4220_1: śūnyatā yac cānimittaṃ yac cāpraṇihitaṃ ye cāṣṭavimokṣā yāś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
S06psp_5u:4220_2: yāni cāryasātyāni yāś cābhijñā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni yāś ca daśabodhisattvabhūmayo
S06psp_5u:4220_3: yāni ca daśatathāgatabalāni yāni ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_5u:4220_4: ye cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_5u:4221_0: ārye 'smin dharmavinaye sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā
S06psp_5u:4221_1: apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ. te ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tathāgatena sattvānām
S06psp_5u:4221_2: avatāraṇārthāya lokavyavahāreṇa vyavakṛtās te dharmā prajñāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4222: na punaḥ paramārthena. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatra śikṣitavyaṃ jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā kecid dharmāḥ pratibodhavyāḥ kecin na pratibodhavyāḥ
S06psp_5u:4224: katame dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā na pratibodhavyāḥ?
S06psp_5u:4227: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca śikṣitvā jñānena ca darśanena ca na pratibodhavyā,
S06psp_5u:4228: sarvākārajñatā jñānena ca darśanena ca pratibodhavyā,
S06psp_5u:4229: sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmāś ca pratibodhavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ārye 'smin dharmavinaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:4230: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4231: āryo dharmavinayo 'nāryo dharmavinaya iti bhagavann ucyate,
S06psp_5u:4235: kiyatā bhagavann anāryo dharmavinaya ity ucyate?
S06psp_5u:4236: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4237: iha subhūte śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā rāgena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:4248: prathamena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:4250: caturthena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:4251: maitryā karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4252: ākāśānantyāyatanena vijñānānantyāyatanenākiṃcanyāyatanena naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4254: āryasatyaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4255: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4263: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4264: daśabhis tathāgatabalair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4265: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśābhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4266: saṃskṛtadhātāv asaṃskṛtadhātau na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4267: tathā hi sarvadharmā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4268: te arūpiṇo 'rūpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:4269: anidarśanā nidarśanaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:4270: apratighā apratighaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:4271: alakṣaṇā alakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā. iti vipakṣapratipakṣayor vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:4272: imā subhūte 'rūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā pāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4273: yatra śikṣitvā na kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:4274: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4275: na punar bhagavan rūpalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na vedanālakṣaṇe na saṃjñālakṣaṇe na saṃskāralakṣaṇe na vijñānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4279: nābdhātulakṣaṇe na tejodhātulakṣaṇe na vāyudhātulakṣaṇe nākāśadhātulakṣaṇe (PSP_5:160)
S06psp_5u:4282: na śīlapāramitālakṣaṇe na kṣāntipāramitālakṣaṇe na vīryapāramitālakṣaṇe na dhyānapāramitālakṣaṇe na prajñāpāramitālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4283: nādhyātmaśūnyatālakṣaṇe na bahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4285: na dvitīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na tṛtīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na caturthadhyānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4286: na mahāmaitrīlakṣaṇe na mahākaruṇālakṣaṇe na muditālakṣaṇe nopekṣālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4287: nākāśānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe na vijñānānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe nākiṃcanyāyatanalakṣaṇe naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4309: yadi bhagavann eteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇe na śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4310: kathaṃ bhagavan na śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇe śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:4314: dharmacakram apravartya kathaṃ sattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyati śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā?
S06psp_5u:4316: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4317: yadi subhūte kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_5u:4318: tadā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ syād,
S06psp_5u:4319: yasmāt tarhi sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tasmāt tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4320: yadi pūrvaṃ lakṣaṇam abhaviṣyat paścād alakṣaṇaṃ na bhaved,
S06psp_5u:4321: yasmāt tarhi subhūte pūrvam eva te sarvadharmā alakṣaṇās tasmāt tarhy apy alakṣaṇās,
S06psp_5u:4322: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4323: nāpy alakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4324: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita evaiṣa lakṣaṇadhātuḥ.
S06psp_5u:4326: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4327: yadi bhagavann alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā na vilakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4329: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:4330: na hi bhagavann avibhāvya prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyā śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā atikramitum,
S06psp_5u:4331: anatikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā na śakyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4332: bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakramya na śakyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntir utpādayitum,
S06psp_5u:4333: anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntim anutpādya na śakyā bodhisattvābhijñā utpādayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4335: buddhakṣetram apariśodhya na śakyāḥ sattvān paripācāyituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4336: sattvān aparipācya na śakyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
S06psp_5u:4337: sarvākārajñatām ananuprāpya na śakyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4338: dharmacakram apravartya na śakyāḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4342: nāpi śakyāḥ sattvā dānamaye puṇyakriyāvastūni pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4345: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4352: na subhūte prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsāttvasyaikalakṣaṇā anekalakṣaṇā,
S06psp_5u:4353: alakṣaṇā bhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:4355: kathaṃ bhagavann alakṣaṇā bhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:4474: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4481: sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat kathaṃ bhagavan sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06psp_5u:4482: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4483: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:4485: vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4489: anuśayaparyutthānāni bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4493: tathā hi subhūte bhāve eṣo 'ham iti saṃjñā,
S06psp_5u:4496: yo dvābhyām antābhyāṃ saktas tasya nāsti vimokṣo,
S06psp_5u:4497_0: nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā na samyakprahāṇabhāvanā narddhipādabhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4497_1: nendriyabhāvanā na balabhāvanā na bodhyaṅgabhāvanā nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanā na duḥkhāryasatyabhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4497_2: na samudayāryasatyabhāvanā na nirodhāryasatyabhāvanā na mārgāryasatyabhāvanā na śūnyatābhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4497_4: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhāvanā na sarvaśūnyatābhāvanā na samādhidhāraṇīmukhabhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4499: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4533: yāvat saṃskārās tāvat sattvā na parimucyante jātyā jarayā vyādhinā maraṇena śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ. tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4535: nāsti śīlaṃ nāsti kṣāntir nāsti vīryaṃ nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prajñā nāsti mārgo nāsti jñānaṃ nāsty abhisamayo nāsty antaśo 'nulomikī kṣāntiḥ. kutaḥ punā rūpasya parijñā,
S06psp_5u:4544: kutaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ parijñā yasya nāsti mārgabhāvanā,
S06psp_5u:4551: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4552: yadi bhagavan bhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ prāptiḥ kuto 'bhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_5u:4553: kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntiḥ? (PSP_5:167)
S06psp_5u:4554: śuklavidarśanābhūmir vā gotrabhūmir vā aṣṭamakabhūmir vā darśanabhūmir vā tanūbhūmir vā vītarāgabhūmir vā kṛtāvībhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā bodhisattvabhūmir vā,
S06psp_5u:4555: yā ca mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
S06psp_5u:4558: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvan sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahīta. punar bhagavan nābhāvasaṃjñinaḥ kasyacid dharmasya sthānaṃ vā nirodho vā utpādo vā bhavati,
S06psp_5u:4560: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4563: na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvībhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na bodhisattvabhūmir,
S06psp_5u:4564: na sā mārgabhāvanāyāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
S06psp_5u:4569: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhāvasaṃjñā vā bhāvaty abhavasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4570: rūpasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā vā saṃjñāsaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4572: rāgasaṃjñā vā rāgaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā doṣasaṃjñā vā doṣaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mohasaṃjñā vā mohaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4573_0: avidyāsaṃjñā vāvidyāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā saṃskāraprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4573_1: vā vijñānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā ṣaḍāyatanasaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4573_2: vā ṣaḍāyatanaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sparśasaṃjñā vā sparśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4574_0: tṛṣṇāsaṃjñā vā tṛṣṇāprahāṇasaṃjñā vopādānasaṃjñā vopādānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā bhavasaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4574_1: vā bhavaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jātisaṃjñā vā jātiprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4575: śokaparidevasaṃjñā vā śokaparidevaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā duṣkhasaṃjñā vā duṣkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4576: duḥkhasaṃjñā vā duḥkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā samudayasaṃjñā vā samudayaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nirodhasaṃjñā vā nirodhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mārgasaṃjñā vā mārgaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4577: sarvākārajñatāsaṃjñā vā sarvākārajñatāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā.
S06psp_5u:4579: naitat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kvacid dharme bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4580: eṣaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānulomikī kṣāntir yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4581: eṣaivāsya mārgabhāvanā yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā,
S06psp_5u:4582: etad evāsya phalaṃ yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā. abhāvaḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4586: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4589: yeṣām abhisaṃbodhāya sarvadharmeṣu ca vaśavartitā visayavartitā cānuprāptā?
S06psp_5u:4590: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4591_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran viviktaṃ kāmair
S06psp_5u:4591_1: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ
S06psp_5u:4593: teṣāñ ca dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs taiś ca dhyānair dhyānāṅgaiś ca na manye,
S06psp_5u:4595: dhyānāni dhyānāṅgāni ca nopalabhe. so 'han tāni catvāri dhyānāny ākāraviśuddhāny upasaṃpadyotsāhaṃ dhyānaṃ vipākaṃ kṛtvā vābhijñājñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi,
S06psp_5u:4601: so 'han tāsāṃ sākṣātkriyānāṃ nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs tābhir abhijñābhir na manye,
S06psp_5u:4603: so 'han tāḥ pañcābhijñā ākāśasamāḥ paśyāmi samāpadye,
S06psp_5u:4604: so 'haṃ punaḥ subhūte ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya yāvad idaṃ duṣkhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4608: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sattvāṃs triṣu rāśiṣu vyākaromi.
S06psp_5u:4609: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4610: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhāvasvabhāvāni catvāri dhyānāny utpāditāni ṣaḍ abhijñā utpāditāḥ sattvāsattayā ca sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ?
S06psp_5u:4611: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4612: sacet subhūte kāmānāṃ vā pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vā bhāvo vābhāvo vā bhaviṣyan,
S06psp_5u:4613: nāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran nābhāvasvabhāvān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān viditvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4614: yasmāt tarhi subhūte kāmānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsti,
S06psp_5u:4615: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
S06psp_5u:4616: tasmād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4617: evaṃ yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣam. sacet subhūte abhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā abhaviṣyan,
S06psp_5u:4618: nāhaṃ subhūte sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye yāvat sattvāṃs tribhyo rāśibhyo na vyupaśamayiṣye,
S06psp_5u:4619: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvābhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
S06psp_5u:4620: tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syāṃ,
S06psp_5u:4626: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ mūrdhābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāpariśuddhiparivartaḥ pañcamaḥ
